tool_description: This is an API that allows users to fetch data about car makes and car models by make or by year, it contains up to 200 car makes and over 10000 car models with regular updates of  new cars.
name: Cars
title: Cars

api_list.name: Get all car makes
api_list.description: This endpoint will return a list of all car makes
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://cars21.p.rapidapi.com/car_makes"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "cars21.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Car models by years
api_list.description: This endpoint will return a list of car models details of a given year
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://cars21.p.rapidapi.com/2022"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "cars21.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://cars21.p.rapidapi.com/{year}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "cars21.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Car models by make and year
api_list.description: This endpoint will return all the car models when given the make and the year
api_list.code:

            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "cars21.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://cars21.p.rapidapi.com/{make}/{year}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "cars21.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Car make years

api_list.name: Car make models
api_list.description: This endpoint when given a car make will return all the models of that make
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://cars21.p.rapidapi.com/renault/models"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "cars21.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
